Html:
Do you foresee this remaining a developer sample/quick start going forward, or do you intend to allow community contributions to flesh out the platform into a more robust blogging solution?

Regards,
Joe

We have no plans to make this anything but a really good developer sample that should be able to run any site you want.

That said, this is a community project now and if the community decides to take it a different direction, we won't stop it.Â  :)
